reviews.name: Alex Stanton
reviews.title: CEO at Bukalapak
reviews.text: We are very happy with the service from the MORENT App. Morent has a low price and also a large variety of cars with good and comfortable facilities. In addition, the service provided by the officers is also very friendly and very polite.
